welcome_message_body: "Welcome to sunny Tucson Estates, where desert landscapes meet southwestern charm! Get ready to experience our vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and breathtaking scenery. We invite you to immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Davis Monthan AFB Airport handles all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Davis Monthan AFB Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Avra Valley Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Avra Valley Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marana Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Marana Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
